title: Mastering Nextflow: From Fundamentals to Expert Practice
text:
1 Intro
Learn how to read a comma-separated sample metadata file containing semicolon-separated FASTQ file lists, and inspect parsed outputs using channels in Nextflow DSL2.

      -c nf_example/test_nf_schema_input.conf 


5.0.1 Schema will check whether the files exist or not
nextflow run .  \
     -main-script nf_example/test_nf_schema_input.nf \
     -c nf_example/test_nf_schema_input.conf \
     --sample_table test_data/sample_meta_FileNotExist.csv 
With the schema setting, the files specified in read1 and read2 fields have to exist.
If not, the error message below will be shown:
